title: Skill Frontmatter Schema
description: Schema for SKILL.md YAML frontmatter in Claude Code

name.description: Unique identifier (lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens only, max 64 chars)

description.description: What the skill does and when to use it. Claude uses this to decide when to apply the skill.

argument-hint.description: Hint shown during autocomplete to indicate expected arguments

disable-model-invocation.description: If true, prevents Claude from automatically loading this skill

user-invocable.description: If false, hides from the / menu

allowed-tools.description: Tools Claude can use without asking permission when this skill is active

model.description: Model to use when this skill is active

context.description: Set to 'fork' to run in a forked subagent context

agent.description: Which subagent type to use when context: fork is set

hooks.description: Hooks scoped to this skill's lifecycle

examples.name: api-testing
examples.description: Tests API endpoints and validates responses. Use when testing REST APIs, GraphQL endpoints, or webhooks. NOT for frontend testing or database operations.
